en: Closing in on enemy position. They are surrounded by mountains, nowhere to go!
de: Closing in on enemy position. They are surrounded by mountains, nowhere to go!
es: Acercándose a la posición del enemigo. Están rodeados de montañas, ¡no tienen a donde ir!
fr: Closing in on enemy position. They are surrounded by mountains, nowhere to go!
ja: Closing in on enemy position. They are surrounded by mountains, nowhere to go!
pl: Zbliżamy się do bazy wroga. Są otoczeni górami, nie mają jak uciec.
ru: Closing in on enemy position. They are surrounded by mountains, nowhere to go!

en: Enemy reinforcements detected!
de: Enemy reinforcements detected!
es: ¡Refuerzos enemigos detectados!
fr: Enemy reinforcements detected!
ja: Enemy reinforcements detected!
pl: Wykryliśmy dodatkowe siły wroga!
ru: Enemy reinforcements detected!

en: Those fanatics just destroyed a civilian plane full of people! With ground-to-air missiles! Where did they even got this kind of equipment?
de: Those fanatics just destroyed a civilian plane full of people! With ground-to-air missiles! Where did they even got this kind of equipment?
es: ¡Esos fanáticos acaban de destruir un avión civil lleno de gente! ¡Con misiles tierra-aire! ¿De dónde sacaron este tipo de equipo?
fr: Those fanatics just destroyed a civilian plane full of people! With ground-to-air missiles! Where did they even got this kind of equipment?
ja: Those fanatics just destroyed a civilian plane full of people! With ground-to-air missiles! Where did they even got this kind of equipment?
pl: Ci fanatycy właśnie zestrzelili samolot pełen cywili! Rakietami ziemia-powietrze! Skąd mają taki sprzęt?
ru: Those fanatics just destroyed a civilian plane full of people! With ground-to-air missiles! Where did they even got this kind of equipment?

en: We have to stop this madness before more people suffer.
de: We have to stop this madness before more people suffer.
es: Tenemos que detener esta locura antes de que más personas sufran.
fr: We have to stop this madness before more people suffer.
ja: We have to stop this madness before more people suffer.
pl: Musimy zatrzymać to szaleństwo zanim ucierpi więcej niewinnych ludzi.
ru: We have to stop this madness before more people suffer.

en: Recon, do you have anything for us?
de: Recon, do you have anything for us?
es: Recon, ¿tienes algo para nosotros?
fr: Recon, do you have anything for us?
ja: Recon, do you have anything for us?
pl: Zwiad, macie coś do zaraportowania?
ru: Recon, do you have anything for us?

en: Local command center located, Sir. Attempting infiltration...
de: Local command center located, Sir. Attempting infiltration...
es: Centro de comando local ubicado, Señor. Intentando la infiltración...
fr: Local command center located, Sir. Attempting infiltration...
ja: Local command center located, Sir. Attempting infiltration...
pl: Namierzyliśmy lokalne centrum dowodzenia. Rozpoczynamy infiltrację...
ru: Local command center located, Sir. Attempting infiltration...

en: Not so fast!
de: Not so fast!
es: ¡No tan rápido!
fr: Not so fast!
ja: Not so fast!
pl: Nie tak szybko!
ru: Not so fast!

en: We have been spotted! I repeat...
de: We have been spotted! I repeat...
es: ¡Nos han visto! Repito...
fr: We have been spotted! I repeat...
ja: We have been spotted! I repeat...
pl: Zostaliśmy zauważeni! Powtarzam...
ru: We have been spotted! I repeat...

en: Now they know we're here. Looks like we have to assault this base old-fashioned way.
de: Now they know we're here. Looks like we have to assault this base old-fashioned way.
es: Ahora saben que estamos aquí. Parece que tenemos que atacar esta base a la antigua usanza.
fr: Now they know we're here. Looks like we have to assault this base old-fashioned way.
ja: Now they know we're here. Looks like we have to assault this base old-fashioned way.
pl: Wiedzą już, że tu jesteśmy. Looks like we have to assault this base old-fashioned way.
ru: Now they know we're here. Looks like we have to assault this base old-fashioned way.

en: Comms established. Requesting backup.
de: Comms established. Requesting backup.
es: Comunicaciones establecidas. Solicitando copia de seguridad.
fr: Comms established. Requesting backup.
ja: Comms established. Requesting backup.
pl: Nawiązaliśmy komunikację. Prosimy o posiłki.
ru: Comms established. Requesting backup.

en: Somebody called?
de: Somebody called?
es: ¿Alguien llamó?
fr: Somebody called?
ja: Somebody called?
pl: Ktoś dzwonił?
ru: Somebody called?

en: Sir, the forest road is blocked. It looks like we could clear it out if we brought a tank here.
de: Sir, the forest road is blocked. It looks like we could clear it out if we brought a tank here.
es: Señor, el camino del bosque está bloqueado. Parece que podríamos limpiarlo si trajéramos un tanque aquí.
fr: Sir, the forest road is blocked. It looks like we could clear it out if we brought a tank here.
ja: Sir, the forest road is blocked. It looks like we could clear it out if we brought a tank here.
pl: Generale, przeprawa przez las została zablokowana. Wygląda na to, że byli byśmy w stanie oczyścić drogę, jeżeli dojedziemy tu czołgami.
ru: Sir, the forest road is blocked. It looks like we could clear it out if we brought a tank here.

en: Welcome back, Sir.  We have finally got a green light on re-taking that airport.
de: Welcome back, Sir.  We have finally got a green light on re-taking that airport.
es: Bienvenido de nuevo, señor. Finalmente tenemos luz verde para volver a tomar ese aeropuerto.
fr: Welcome back, Sir.  We have finally got a green light on re-taking that airport.
ja: Welcome back, Sir.  We have finally got a green light on re-taking that airport.
pl: Witamy spowrotem, Generale. W końcu pozwolono nam rozpocząć operację odbicia lotniska.
ru: Welcome back, Sir.  We have finally got a green light on re-taking that airport.

en: This area is highly contested. Luckily, our recent victories forced our foe to re-group, so they can't expect help anytime soon.
de: This area is highly contested. Luckily, our recent victories forced our foe to re-group, so they can't expect help anytime soon.
es: Esta zona se encuentra altamente disputada. Afortunadamente, nuestras recientes victorias obligaron a nuestro enemigo a reagruparse, por lo que no pueden esperar ayuda en un corto plazo.
fr: This area is highly contested. Luckily, our recent victories forced our foe to re-group, so they can't expect help anytime soon.
ja: This area is highly contested. Luckily, our recent victories forced our foe to re-group, so they can't expect help anytime soon.
pl: Walka o ten teren jest zażarta. Na szczęście nasze ostatnie zwycięśtwo zmusiło wroga do przegrupowania się, więc nie mogę spodziewać się w najbliższym czasie żadnych posiłków.
ru: This area is highly contested. Luckily, our recent victories forced our foe to re-group, so they can't expect help anytime soon.

en: This is recon. We have located enemy HQ. Looks like they are fortifying their position.
de: This is recon. We have located enemy HQ. Looks like they are fortifying their position.
es: Esto es recon. Hemos localizado el Cuartel General del enemigo. Parece que están fortificando su posición.
fr: This is recon. We have located enemy HQ. Looks like they are fortifying their position.
ja: This is recon. We have located enemy HQ. Looks like they are fortifying their position.
pl: Tu oddział zwiadowczy. Odnaleźliśmy centrum dowodzenia wroga. Wygląda na to, że umacniają swoją pozycję.
ru: This is recon. We have located enemy HQ. Looks like they are fortifying their position.

en: Moving out before they spot us.
de: Moving out before they spot us.
es: Muevete antes de que nos vean.
fr: Moving out before they spot us.
ja: Moving out before they spot us.
pl: Wycofujemy się zanim nas zauważą.
ru: Moving out before they spot us.

en: Load main gun! Fire!
de: Load main gun! Fire!
es: ¡Cargar el cañón! ¡Fuego!
fr: Load main gun! Fire!
ja: Load main gun! Fire!
pl: Załadować główne działo! Ognia!
ru: Load main gun! Fire!

en: This mountain pass is vital to our operation. We have to hold this position.
de: This mountain pass is vital to our operation. We have to hold this position.
es: Este paso de montaña es vital para nuestra operación. Tenemos que mantener esta posición.
fr: This mountain pass is vital to our operation. We have to hold this position.
ja: This mountain pass is vital to our operation. We have to hold this position.
pl: Ta przełęcz jest krytyczna dla naszej operacji. Musimy utrzymać tą pozycję.
ru: This mountain pass is vital to our operation. We have to hold this position.

en: The enemy base is going to put a pressure on us from the flank. Take it out if you can, but do not compromise our mission, Commander.
de: The enemy base is going to put a pressure on us from the flank. Take it out if you can, but do not compromise our mission, Commander.
es: La base enemiga va a presionarnos desde el flanco. Captúrala si puedes, pero no comprometa nuestra misión, Comandante.
fr: The enemy base is going to put a pressure on us from the flank. Take it out if you can, but do not compromise our mission, Commander.
ja: The enemy base is going to put a pressure on us from the flank. Take it out if you can, but do not compromise our mission, Commander.
pl: Siły wroga z pobliskiej bazy na pewno będą napierać z flanki. Zajmijmy tą bazę, jeżeli damy radę to zrobić bez narażania głównej misji.
ru: The enemy base is going to put a pressure on us from the flank. Take it out if you can, but do not compromise our mission, Commander.

en: The transports will be ready to go very soon.
de: The transports will be ready to go very soon.
es: Los transportes estarán listos muy pronto.
fr: The transports will be ready to go very soon.
ja: The transports will be ready to go very soon.
pl: Transport będzie wkrótce gotowy do drogi.
ru: The transports will be ready to go very soon.

en: Nearby city really needs what's in these trucks. We have to secure the road.
de: Nearby city really needs what's in these trucks. We have to secure the road.
es: La ciudad cercana realmente necesita lo que hay en estos camiones. Tenemos que asegurar el camino.
fr: Nearby city really needs what's in these trucks. We have to secure the road.
ja: Nearby city really needs what's in these trucks. We have to secure the road.
pl: Pobliskie miasto bardzo potrzebuje zawartości tych ciężarówek. Musimy zabezpieczyć ich trasę.
ru: Nearby city really needs what's in these trucks. We have to secure the road.

en: Capturing and holding these towers along the way should allow us to go safely.
de: Capturing and holding these towers along the way should allow us to go safely.
es: Capturar y mantener estas torres en el camino nos debe permitir ir con seguridad.
fr: Capturing and holding these towers along the way should allow us to go safely.
ja: Capturing and holding these towers along the way should allow us to go safely.
pl: Zajęcie i utrzymanie tych wież powinno zapewnić nam bezpieczny przejazd.
ru: Capturing and holding these towers along the way should allow us to go safely.

en: Congratulations on securing the route. Now we should be able to co-ordinate our forces and defend the convoy.
de: Congratulations on securing the route. Now we should be able to co-ordinate our forces and defend the convoy.
es: Felicitaciones por asegurar la ruta. Ahora deberíamos poder coordinar nuestras fuerzas y defender el convoy.
fr: Congratulations on securing the route. Now we should be able to co-ordinate our forces and defend the convoy.
ja: Congratulations on securing the route. Now we should be able to co-ordinate our forces and defend the convoy.
pl: Gratulacje, droga jest zabezpieczona. Powinniśmy być w stanie zkoordynować nasze siły i skutecznie obronić konwój.
ru: Congratulations on securing the route. Now we should be able to co-ordinate our forces and defend the convoy.

en: They will not stop us.
de: They will not stop us.
es: No nos detendrán.
fr: They will not stop us.
ja: They will not stop us.
pl: Nie zatrzymają nas.
ru: They will not stop us.

en: Sir, we have scouted an airfield near the enemy HQ. We have to be cautious when pushing with tanks.
de: Sir, we have scouted an airfield near the enemy HQ. We have to be cautious when pushing with tanks.
es: Señor, hemos hecho un reconocimiento de un aeródromo cerca del Cuartel General enemigo. Hay que tener cuidado al avanzar con los tanques.
fr: Sir, we have scouted an airfield near the enemy HQ. We have to be cautious when pushing with tanks.
ja: Sir, we have scouted an airfield near the enemy HQ. We have to be cautious when pushing with tanks.
pl: Dowódco, napotkaliśmy niewielkie lotnisko w pobliżu bazy wroga. Musimy zachować ostrożność wysyłając nasze pojazdy opancerzone.
ru: Sir, we have scouted an airfield near the enemy HQ. We have to be cautious when pushing with tanks.

en: Commander, I assume you already heard about our little... mistake.
de: Commander, I assume you already heard about our little... mistake.
es: Comandante, asumo que ya escuchó sobre nuestro pequeño ... error.
fr: Commander, I assume you already heard about our little... mistake.
ja: Commander, I assume you already heard about our little... mistake.
pl: Dowódco, zapewne słyszał już pan o naszej... pomyłce.
ru: Commander, I assume you already heard about our little... mistake.

en: As it turns out, that military transport we shot down wasn't a military vessel at all.
de: As it turns out, that military transport we shot down wasn't a military vessel at all.
es: Resulta que el transporte militar que derribamos no era un buque militar.
fr: As it turns out, that military transport we shot down wasn't a military vessel at all.
ja: As it turns out, that military transport we shot down wasn't a military vessel at all.
pl: Jak się okazało, zestrzelony przez nas wojskowy transport nie był samolotem militarnym.
ru: As it turns out, that military transport we shot down wasn't a military vessel at all.

en: We have managed to blockade the crash site for now, but international investigators are on their way.
de: We have managed to blockade the crash site for now, but international investigators are on their way.
es: Hemos logrado bloquear el sitio del accidente por ahora, pero los investigadores internacionales están en camino.
fr: We have managed to blockade the crash site for now, but international investigators are on their way.
ja: We have managed to blockade the crash site for now, but international investigators are on their way.
pl: Udało nam się tymczasowo zablokować miejsce rozbicia samolotu, ale międzynarodowi śledczy są już w drodze.
ru: We have managed to blockade the crash site for now, but international investigators are on their way.

en: Secure this position, Commander.
de: Secure this position, Commander.
es: Asegure esta posición, Comandante.
fr: Secure this position, Commander.
ja: Secure this position, Commander.
pl: Musimy zabezpieczyć tą pozycję, Dowódco.
ru: Secure this position, Commander.

en: Armoured column, move forward.
de: Armoured column, move forward.
es: Columna blindada, avance.
fr: Armoured column, move forward.
ja: Armoured column, move forward.
pl: Kolumna opancerzona, ruszamy.
ru: Armoured column, move forward.

en: Get out of our way, and we might just let you withdraw your forces... for now.
de: Get out of our way, and we might just let you withdraw your forces... for now.
es: Apártate de nuestro camino, y podríamos dejarte retirar tus fuerzas ... por ahora.
fr: Get out of our way, and we might just let you withdraw your forces... for now.
ja: Get out of our way, and we might just let you withdraw your forces... for now.
pl: Zejdźcie nam z drogi, a może pozwolimy wam się bezpiecznie wycofać... tym razem.
ru: Get out of our way, and we might just let you withdraw your forces... for now.

en: Save your breath.
de: Save your breath.
es: Guarda tu aliento.
fr: Save your breath.
ja: Save your breath.
pl: Oszczędź sobie gróźb.
ru: Save your breath.

en: My apologies, Commander. We lost the airport you previously secured. Enemy attack was switft and devastating.
de: My apologies, Commander. We lost the airport you previously secured. Enemy attack was switft and devastating.
es: Mis disculpas, Comandante. Perdimos el aeropuerto que tenías asegurado anteriormente. El ataque enemigo fue rápido y devastador.
fr: My apologies, Commander. We lost the airport you previously secured. Enemy attack was switft and devastating.
ja: My apologies, Commander. We lost the airport you previously secured. Enemy attack was switft and devastating.
pl: Przepraszam, Dowódco. Straciliśmy lotnisko, które zdobyłeś. Atak wroga był szybki i dewastujący.
ru: My apologies, Commander. We lost the airport you previously secured. Enemy attack was switft and devastating.

en: We don't have much footing here. Taking control of the barracks building on the other side of the forest is a good start.
de: We don't have much footing here. Taking control of the barracks building on the other side of the forest is a good start.
es: No tenemos mucho pie aquí. Tomar el control de los barracones que se encuentran al otro lado del bosque es un buen comienzo.
fr: We don't have much footing here. Taking control of the barracks building on the other side of the forest is a good start.
ja: We don't have much footing here. Taking control of the barracks building on the other side of the forest is a good start.
pl: Nasza pozycja nie jest zbyt pewna. Przejęcie baraków po drugiej stronie lasu będzie dobrym początkiem.
ru: We don't have much footing here. Taking control of the barracks building on the other side of the forest is a good start.

en: I've dispatched a couple of small squads to scout out the battlefield ahead.
de: I've dispatched a couple of small squads to scout out the battlefield ahead.
es: He enviado a un par de escuadrones pequeños para explorar el campo de batalla.
fr: I've dispatched a couple of small squads to scout out the battlefield ahead.
ja: I've dispatched a couple of small squads to scout out the battlefield ahead.
pl: Rozesłałem małe oddziały rozpoznawcze, aby zbadać pole bitwy.
ru: I've dispatched a couple of small squads to scout out the battlefield ahead.

en: Commander, we have found explosive traps in most of the buildings. They really didn't want us to capture it.
de: Commander, we have found explosive traps in most of the buildings. They really didn't want us to capture it.
es: Comandante, hemos encontrado trampas explosivas en la mayoría de los edificios. Realmente no querían que los capturáremos.
fr: Commander, we have found explosive traps in most of the buildings. They really didn't want us to capture it.
ja: Commander, we have found explosive traps in most of the buildings. They really didn't want us to capture it.
pl: Dowódco, większość zabudowań dookoła lotniska było zaminowanych. Na prawdę nie chcieli, abyśmy zajęli tą pozycję.
ru: Commander, we have found explosive traps in most of the buildings. They really didn't want us to capture it.

en: And it seems, that explosions alerted them. Expect increased resistance.
de: And it seems, that explosions alerted them. Expect increased resistance.
es: Parece que las explosiones los alertaron. Se espera mayor resistencia.
fr: And it seems, that explosions alerted them. Expect increased resistance.
ja: And it seems, that explosions alerted them. Expect increased resistance.
pl: Wygląda na to, że eksplozja wywołała alarm. Musimy spodziewać się zwiększonego oporu.
ru: And it seems, that explosions alerted them. Expect increased resistance.

en: We have some initial reports.
de: We have some initial reports.
es: Tenemos algunos informes iniciales.
fr: We have some initial reports.
ja: We have some initial reports.
pl: Otrzymaliśmy wstępne raporty.
ru: We have some initial reports.

en: The old encampment is ruined, though some light weapons for infantry can be salvaged for training more troops.
de: The old encampment is ruined, though some light weapons for infantry can be salvaged for training more troops.
es: El antiguo campamento está en ruinas, aunque algunas armas ligeras para la infantería pueden salvarse para entrenar más tropas.
fr: The old encampment is ruined, though some light weapons for infantry can be salvaged for training more troops.
ja: The old encampment is ruined, though some light weapons for infantry can be salvaged for training more troops.
pl: Stary obóz jest zrujnowany, ale jest tam trochę broni lekkiej, której możemy użyć do szkolenia piechoty.
ru: The old encampment is ruined, though some light weapons for infantry can be salvaged for training more troops.

en: Tank factory has been abandoned when it lost power, but we should be able to restore basic functions.
de: Tank factory has been abandoned when it lost power, but we should be able to restore basic functions.
es: La fábrica de tanques ha sido abandonada cuando perdió energía, pero deberíamos poder restaurar las funciones básicas.
fr: Tank factory has been abandoned when it lost power, but we should be able to restore basic functions.
ja: Tank factory has been abandoned when it lost power, but we should be able to restore basic functions.
pl: Fabryka czołgów została opuszczona gdy zawiodła sieć energetyczna, ale powinniśmy być w stanie jej użyć.
ru: Tank factory has been abandoned when it lost power, but we should be able to restore basic functions.

en: Most of the city is completely ruined.
de: Most of the city is completely ruined.
es: La mayor parte de la ciudad está completamente destruida.
fr: Most of the city is completely ruined.
ja: Most of the city is completely ruined.
pl: Większość miasta jest całkowicie zrujnowana.
ru: Most of the city is completely ruined.

en: Airport buildings have been blown up, not much left in there. Military hangars seem fairly untouched, we should be able to use them.
de: Airport buildings have been blown up, not much left in there. Military hangars seem fairly untouched, we should be able to use them.
es: Los edificios del aeropuerto han sido volados, no queda mucho en ellos. Los hangares militares parecen bastante intactos, deberíamos poder usarlos.
fr: Airport buildings have been blown up, not much left in there. Military hangars seem fairly untouched, we should be able to use them.
ja: Airport buildings have been blown up, not much left in there. Military hangars seem fairly untouched, we should be able to use them.
pl: Budynki lotniska zostały wysadzone, nie zostało zbyt wiele. Hangary wojskowe są całe, powinny nadawać się do użycia.
ru: Airport buildings have been blown up, not much left in there. Military hangars seem fairly untouched, we should be able to use them.

en: We have visual confirmation on one of the enemy encampments. Looks like their command centre is not here.
de: We have visual confirmation on one of the enemy encampments. Looks like their command centre is not here.
es: Tenemos confirmación visual de uno de los campamentos enemigos. Parece que su centro de mando no está aquí.
fr: We have visual confirmation on one of the enemy encampments. Looks like their command centre is not here.
ja: We have visual confirmation on one of the enemy encampments. Looks like their command centre is not here.
pl: Widzimy jedno z obozowisk wroga. Wygląda na to, że centrum dowodzenia jest w innym miejscu.
ru: We have visual confirmation on one of the enemy encampments. Looks like their command centre is not here.

en: I think they spotted us, falling back.
de: I think they spotted us, falling back.
es: Creo que nos vieron, retrocediendo.
fr: I think they spotted us, falling back.
ja: I think they spotted us, falling back.
pl: Chyba nas dostrzegli, wycofujemy się.
ru: I think they spotted us, falling back.

en: It's a trap!
de: It's a trap!
es: ¡Es una trampa!
fr: It's a trap!
ja: It's a trap!
pl: To pułapka!
ru: It's a trap!

en: Rebel scum!
de: Rebel scum!
es: ¡Escoria rebelde!
fr: Rebel scum!
ja: Rebel scum!
pl: Rebelianckie ścierwo!
ru: Rebel scum!

en: Sir! Our forces are on the edge, we need you to take command!
de: Sir! Our forces are on the edge, we need you to take command!
es: ¡Señor! Nuestras fuerzas están al límite, ¡necesitamos que tomes el mando!
fr: Sir! Our forces are on the edge, we need you to take command!
ja: Sir! Our forces are on the edge, we need you to take command!
pl: Panie Generale! Nasi żołnierze robią się nerwowi, potrzebujemy rozkazów!
ru: Sir! Our forces are on the edge, we need you to take command!

en: Sir! Enemy forces are getting dangerously close to our HQ! We should drive them back, otherwise we risk loosing this battle!
de: Sir! Enemy forces are getting dangerously close to our HQ! We should drive them back, otherwise we risk loosing this battle!
es: ¡Señor! ¡Las fuerzas enemigas se están acercando peligrosamente a nuestro Cuartel General! ¡Debemos rechazarlos, de lo contrario corremos el riesgo de perder esta batalla!
fr: Sir! Enemy forces are getting dangerously close to our HQ! We should drive them back, otherwise we risk loosing this battle!
ja: Sir! Enemy forces are getting dangerously close to our HQ! We should drive them back, otherwise we risk loosing this battle!
pl: Panie Generale! Wrogie siły są niebezpiecznie blisko naszej kwatery głównej! Musimy ich odepchnąć, nie możemy ryzykować przegrania tej bitwy.
ru: Sir! Enemy forces are getting dangerously close to our HQ! We should drive them back, otherwise we risk loosing this battle!

en: Our forces have taken significant losses. We should deploy more soldiers from our HQ.
de: Our forces have taken significant losses. We should deploy more soldiers from our HQ.
es: Nuestras fuerzas han sufrido pérdidas significativas. Deberíamos desplegar más soldados desde nuestro Cuartel General
fr: Our forces have taken significant losses. We should deploy more soldiers from our HQ.
ja: Our forces have taken significant losses. We should deploy more soldiers from our HQ.
pl: Nasze siły poniosły duże straty. Powinniśmy wysłać więcej jednostek z naszej kwatery głównej.
ru: Our forces have taken significant losses. We should deploy more soldiers from our HQ.

en: Sir! We are ready to begin the assault on the Presidental Palace! Our troops are awaiting your orders.
de: Sir! We are ready to begin the assault on the Presidental Palace! Our troops are awaiting your orders.
es: ¡Señor! ¡Estamos listos para empezar el asalto al Palacio Presidencial! Nuestras tropas están esperando tus órdenes.
fr: Sir! We are ready to begin the assault on the Presidental Palace! Our troops are awaiting your orders.
ja: Sir! We are ready to begin the assault on the Presidental Palace! Our troops are awaiting your orders.
pl: Panie Generale! Jesteśmy gotowi do rozpoczęcia ataku na Pałac Prezydencki. Żołnierze czekają na pańskie rozkazy.
ru: Sir! We are ready to begin the assault on the Presidental Palace! Our troops are awaiting your orders.

en: Palace defence HQ is close. Let's take it!
de: Palace defence HQ is close. Let's take it!
es: La defensa de Palacio está cerca. ¡Vamos a tomarlo!
fr: Palace defence HQ is close. Let's take it!
ja: Palace defence HQ is close. Let's take it!
pl: Pałacowa kwatera główna jest już blisko. Zajmijmy ją!
ru: Palace defence HQ is close. Let's take it!

en: This is the enemy HQ. We need to bring our soldiers there and capture it. Without central command, military forces guarding the Palace will disperse.
de: This is the enemy HQ. We need to bring our soldiers there and capture it. Without central command, military forces guarding the Palace will disperse.
es: Este es el Cuartel General enemigo. Necesitamos llevar a nuestros soldados allí y capturarlo. Sin una comandancia central, las fuerzas militares que custodian el Palacio se dispersarán.
fr: This is the enemy HQ. We need to bring our soldiers there and capture it. Without central command, military forces guarding the Palace will disperse.
ja: This is the enemy HQ. We need to bring our soldiers there and capture it. Without central command, military forces guarding the Palace will disperse.
pl: To kwatera główna sił wroga. Musimy dotrzeć do niej naszą piechotą aby ją zająć. Bez centrum dowodzenia siły wroga broniące pałacu wycofają się.
ru: This is the enemy HQ. We need to bring our soldiers there and capture it. Without central command, military forces guarding the Palace will disperse.

en: Fall back soldier!
de: Fall back soldier!
es: ¡Atrás soldado!
fr: Fall back soldier!
ja: Fall back soldier!
pl: Żołnierzu, wycofaj się!
ru: Fall back soldier!

en: We should also claim as many communication towers as possible to gain more resources for our operations. Those are crucial, as we need to pay for the deployment of new units, and movement of those already in the field.
de: We should also claim as many communication towers as possible to gain more resources for our operations. Those are crucial, as we need to pay for the deployment of new units, and movement of those already in the field.
es: También deberíamos reclamar tantas torres de comunicación como sea posible para obtener más recursos para nuestras operaciones. Son cruciales, ya que tenemos que pagar el despliegue de nuevas unidades y el movimiento de aquellas que ya están en el campo.
fr: We should also claim as many communication towers as possible to gain more resources for our operations. Those are crucial, as we need to pay for the deployment of new units, and movement of those already in the field.
ja: We should also claim as many communication towers as possible to gain more resources for our operations. Those are crucial, as we need to pay for the deployment of new units, and movement of those already in the field.
pl: Powinniśmy zająć tak wiele wież komunikacyjnych, ile tylko damy radę, aby zdobyć więcej zasobów. Są one krytyczne dla naszych działań, gdyż umożliwiają nam poruszanie wojsk oraz zakup nowych jednostek.
ru: We should also claim as many communication towers as possible to gain more resources for our operations. Those are crucial, as we need to pay for the deployment of new units, and movement of those already in the field.

en: Our enemy is already capturing nearby towers, we need to hurry and take them back to gain advantage!
de: Our enemy is already capturing nearby towers, we need to hurry and take them back to gain advantage!
es: Nuestro enemigo está capturando torres cercanas, ¡necesitamos darnos prisa y recuperarlas para obtener ventaja!
fr: Our enemy is already capturing nearby towers, we need to hurry and take them back to gain advantage!
ja: Our enemy is already capturing nearby towers, we need to hurry and take them back to gain advantage!
pl: Przeciwnik zaczął już zajmowanie wież w swojej okolicy, musimy się pospieszyć i je przejąc, aby zyskać przewagę!
ru: Our enemy is already capturing nearby towers, we need to hurry and take them back to gain advantage!

en: You are outnumbered! Stand down and let us get that corrupted bastard!
de: You are outnumbered! Stand down and let us get that corrupted bastard!
es: ¡Estais en inferioridad numérica! ¡Alejaos y dejadnos atrapar a ese bastardo corrupto!
fr: You are outnumbered! Stand down and let us get that corrupted bastard!
ja: You are outnumbered! Stand down and let us get that corrupted bastard!
pl: Jesteście otoczeni! Poddajcie się i wydajcie nam tego zdrajcę narodu!
ru: You are outnumbered! Stand down and let us get that corrupted bastard!

en: They have found us! Raise the alarm!
de: They have found us! Raise the alarm!
es: ¡Nos encontraron! ¡Da la voz de alarma!
fr: They have found us! Raise the alarm!
ja: They have found us! Raise the alarm!
pl: Alarm! Nasza kwatera została odkryta!
ru: They have found us! Raise the alarm!

en: Our forces are limited here. We should secure these infantry barracks. This building will enable us to deploy new soldiers for a lower price.
de: Our forces are limited here. We should secure these infantry barracks. This building will enable us to deploy new soldiers for a lower price.
es: Aquí nuestras fuerzas son limitadas. Deberíamos asegurar estos barracones. Este edificio nos permitirá desplegar nuevos soldados a un precio menor.
fr: Our forces are limited here. We should secure these infantry barracks. This building will enable us to deploy new soldiers for a lower price.
ja: Our forces are limited here. We should secure these infantry barracks. This building will enable us to deploy new soldiers for a lower price.
pl: Nasze siły są ograniczone. Powinniśmy zająć te baraki piechoty. Pozwolą nam one rozlokować wojska niższym kosztem.
ru: Our forces are limited here. We should secure these infantry barracks. This building will enable us to deploy new soldiers for a lower price.

en: Great work, Sir.
de: Great work, Sir.
es: Gran trabajo, Señor.
fr: Great work, Sir.
ja: Great work, Sir.
pl: Dobra robota, Generale.
ru: Great work, Sir.

en: Please be advised, that claiming buildings other than communication towers will require our soldier to stay inside, so make sure we always have enough infantry on the battlefield.
de: Please be advised, that claiming buildings other than communication towers will require our soldier to stay inside, so make sure we always have enough infantry on the battlefield.
es: Ten en cuenta que capturar edificios que no sean torres de comunicación requerirá que nuestro soldado permanezca dentro, así que asegúrate de que siempre tengas suficiente infantería en el campo de batalla.
fr: Please be advised, that claiming buildings other than communication towers will require our soldier to stay inside, so make sure we always have enough infantry on the battlefield.
ja: Please be advised, that claiming buildings other than communication towers will require our soldier to stay inside, so make sure we always have enough infantry on the battlefield.
pl: Proszę pamiętać, że zajęcie budynku innego niż wieża komunikacyjna wymaga, aby nasz żołnierz pozostał w środku, musimy więc zadbać o to, by zawsze mieć ich wystarczająco dużo na polu bitwy.
ru: Please be advised, that claiming buildings other than communication towers will require our soldier to stay inside, so make sure we always have enough infantry on the battlefield.

en: There were some recruits waiting in the barracks. They have joined us.
de: There were some recruits waiting in the barracks. They have joined us.
es: Había algunos reclutas esperando en el cuartel. Se han unido a nosotros.
fr: There were some recruits waiting in the barracks. They have joined us.
ja: There were some recruits waiting in the barracks. They have joined us.
pl: W barakach szkoliło się kilku rekrutów. Dołączyli do naszych sił.
ru: There were some recruits waiting in the barracks. They have joined us.

en: Deploying more units will cost us resources, same as moving them. Spend them wisely.
de: Deploying more units will cost us resources, same as moving them. Spend them wisely.
es: Desplegar más unidades te costará recursos, al igual que moverlas. Gastalos sabiamente.
fr: Deploying more units will cost us resources, same as moving them. Spend them wisely.
ja: Deploying more units will cost us resources, same as moving them. Spend them wisely.
pl: Rozlokowanie nowych jednostek kosztuje nas zasoby, te same, których używamy do poruszania. Musimy mądrze nimi zarządzać.
ru: Deploying more units will cost us resources, same as moving them. Spend them wisely.

en: In order to deploy a unit, dedicated spawn tile next to the building must be free. If one of your units occupies that tile, you have to move it first.
de: In order to deploy a unit, dedicated spawn tile next to the building must be free. If one of your units occupies that tile, you have to move it first.
es: Para desplegar una unidad, el azulejo de despliegue al lado del edificio debe estar libre. Si una de tus unidades ocupa el azulejo, debes moverla primero.
fr: In order to deploy a unit, dedicated spawn tile next to the building must be free. If one of your units occupies that tile, you have to move it first.
ja: In order to deploy a unit, dedicated spawn tile next to the building must be free. If one of your units occupies that tile, you have to move it first.
pl: Aby rozlokować nową jednostkę, pole wyjścia z budynku musi być puste. Jeżeli zajmuje je nasza jednostka, musimy ją najpierw odsunąć.
ru: In order to deploy a unit, dedicated spawn tile next to the building must be free. If one of your units occupies that tile, you have to move it first.

en: You can use this to your advantage as well. Blocking spawn tiles next to enemy buildings will prevent them from deploying reinforcements.
de: You can use this to your advantage as well. Blocking spawn tiles next to enemy buildings will prevent them from deploying reinforcements.
es: También puedes usarlo como una ventaja. El bloqueo de los azulejos de despliegue junto a los edificios enemigos evitará que desplieguen refuerzos.
fr: You can use this to your advantage as well. Blocking spawn tiles next to enemy buildings will prevent them from deploying reinforcements.
ja: You can use this to your advantage as well. Blocking spawn tiles next to enemy buildings will prevent them from deploying reinforcements.
pl: Możemy użyć tej wiedzy przeciwko wrogowi. Ustawienie jendostki na wyjściu wrogiego budynku zablokuje jego możliwość rozlokowywania posiłków.
ru: You can use this to your advantage as well. Blocking spawn tiles next to enemy buildings will prevent them from deploying reinforcements.

en: Sir, recently we've been getting reports of increased militia activity in this region. We suspect there might be an organized command centre nearby. We should investigate.
de: Sir, recently we've been getting reports of increased militia activity in this region. We suspect there might be an organized command centre nearby. We should investigate.
es: Señor, recientemente hemos recibido informes de una mayor actividad de las milicias en esta región. Sospechamos que podría haber un comando organizado cerca. Deberíamos investigar.
fr: Sir, recently we've been getting reports of increased militia activity in this region. We suspect there might be an organized command centre nearby. We should investigate.
ja: Sir, recently we've been getting reports of increased militia activity in this region. We suspect there might be an organized command centre nearby. We should investigate.
pl: Panie Generale, otrzymaliśmy ostatnio wiele raportów o działalności milicji w tym rejonie. Podejrzewamy, że mogą mieć tu zorganizowane centrum dowodzenia. Powinniśmy przeszukać tę okolicę.
ru: Sir, recently we've been getting reports of increased militia activity in this region. We suspect there might be an organized command centre nearby. We should investigate.

en: Sir! We just got a tip off from local civilians indicating the location of the militia HQ. This is our objective.
de: Sir! We just got a tip off from local civilians indicating the location of the militia HQ. This is our objective.
es: ¡Señor! Acabamos de recibir un aviso de los civiles locales que indican la ubicación del cuartel general de la milicia. Este es nuestro objetivo.
fr: Sir! We just got a tip off from local civilians indicating the location of the militia HQ. This is our objective.
ja: Sir! We just got a tip off from local civilians indicating the location of the militia HQ. This is our objective.
pl: Panie Generale! Otrzymaliśmy informacje od lokalnych cywili wskazującą prawdopodobną lokalizację kwatery milicji. To nasz główny cel.
ru: Sir! We just got a tip off from local civilians indicating the location of the militia HQ. This is our objective.

en: Our objective is to take the City Hall. Local defense forces are still disorganized. We should use this window of opportunity.
de: Our objective is to take the City Hall. Local defense forces are still disorganized. We should use this window of opportunity.
es: Nuestro objetivo es tomar el Ayuntamiento. Las fuerzas de defensa locales todavía están desorganizadas. Deberíamos usar esa oportunidad.
fr: Our objective is to take the City Hall. Local defense forces are still disorganized. We should use this window of opportunity.
ja: Our objective is to take the City Hall. Local defense forces are still disorganized. We should use this window of opportunity.
pl: Naszym celem jest centrum miasta. Lokalne siły są wciąż zdezorganizowane. Musimy skorzystać z tej okazji.
ru: Our objective is to take the City Hall. Local defense forces are still disorganized. We should use this window of opportunity.

en: Commander, this is not good! Local forces have taken active controll of this factory. We need to re-take it, or we will face a lot more tanks that we can handle.
de: Commander, this is not good! Local forces have taken active controll of this factory. We need to re-take it, or we will face a lot more tanks that we can handle.
es: Comandante, ¡esto no es bueno! Las fuerzas locales han tomado el control de esta fábrica. Necesitamos recuperarla, o nos enfrentaremos a muchos más tanques de los que podemos soportar.
fr: Commander, this is not good! Local forces have taken active controll of this factory. We need to re-take it, or we will face a lot more tanks that we can handle.
ja: Commander, this is not good! Local forces have taken active controll of this factory. We need to re-take it, or we will face a lot more tanks that we can handle.
pl: Dowódco, nie wygląda to dobrze. Lokalne wojsko przejęło bezpośrednią kontrolę nad fabryką. Musimy ją odbić, w przeciwnym wypadku ryzykujemy walkę z większą ilością czołgów, niż jesteśmy w stanie zniszczyć.
ru: Commander, this is not good! Local forces have taken active controll of this factory. We need to re-take it, or we will face a lot more tanks that we can handle.

en: Great work, Commander. Nothing will stop us now.
de: Great work, Commander. Nothing will stop us now.
es: Gran trabajo, Comandante. Nada nos detendrá ahora.
fr: Great work, Commander. Nothing will stop us now.
ja: Great work, Commander. Nothing will stop us now.
pl: Dobra robota, Dowódco. Nic nas teraz nie zatrzyma.
ru: Great work, Commander. Nothing will stop us now.

en: Local defense forces ordered a tank recently. I guess it is ours now.
de: Local defense forces ordered a tank recently. I guess it is ours now.
es: Las fuerzas de defensa locales ordenaron un tanque recientemente. Supongo que ahora es nuestro.
fr: Local defense forces ordered a tank recently. I guess it is ours now.
ja: Local defense forces ordered a tank recently. I guess it is ours now.
pl: Lokalne siły zbrojne zamówiły niedawno nowe czołgi. Teraz należą do nas.
ru: Local defense forces ordered a tank recently. I guess it is ours now.

en: Welcome, Commander. Apologies for the delays.
de: Welcome, Commander. Apologies for the delays.
es: Bienvenido, Comandante. Disculpa por los retrasos.
fr: Welcome, Commander. Apologies for the delays.
ja: Welcome, Commander. Apologies for the delays.
pl: Witam, Dowódco. Przepraszam za opóźnienia.
ru: Welcome, Commander. Apologies for the delays.

en: We finally managed to set up a camp. Wasn't easy to gather troops after we lost controll of the army.
de: We finally managed to set up a camp. Wasn't easy to gather troops after we lost controll of the army.
es: Finalmente logramos establecer un campamento. No fue fácil reunir tropas después de que perdieramos el control del ejercito.
fr: We finally managed to set up a camp. Wasn't easy to gather troops after we lost controll of the army.
ja: We finally managed to set up a camp. Wasn't easy to gather troops after we lost controll of the army.
pl: Udało nam się zakończyć rozstawianie obozu. Zebranie odpowiednich sił nie było łatwe odkąd straciliśmy kontrolę nad regularną armią.
ru: We finally managed to set up a camp. Wasn't easy to gather troops after we lost controll of the army.

en: Our militiants managed to steal a tank from nearby military base. It won't be long before someone notices.
de: Our militiants managed to steal a tank from nearby military base. It won't be long before someone notices.
es: Nuestros militantes lograron robar un tanque de la base militar que hay cerca. No pasará mucho antes de que alguien se dé cuenta.
fr: Our militiants managed to steal a tank from nearby military base. It won't be long before someone notices.
ja: Our militiants managed to steal a tank from nearby military base. It won't be long before someone notices.
pl: Oddział milicjantów zdołał ukraść czołg z pobliskiej bazy. Zapewne niedługo zorientują się, że go brakuje.
ru: Our militiants managed to steal a tank from nearby military base. It won't be long before someone notices.

en: Tanks are great at dealing with infantry - this one will be a valuble asset in this mission. Still, we need more if we are to succeed.
de: Tanks are great at dealing with infantry - this one will be a valuble asset in this mission. Still, we need more if we are to succeed.
es: Los tanques son excelentes para tratar con la infantería - este será un activo valioso en esta misión. Aún así, necesitamos más si queremos tener éxito.
fr: Tanks are great at dealing with infantry - this one will be a valuble asset in this mission. Still, we need more if we are to succeed.
ja: Tanks are great at dealing with infantry - this one will be a valuble asset in this mission. Still, we need more if we are to succeed.
pl: Czołgi są bardzo efektywne w zwalczaniu piechoty - nieoceniona pomoc w tej misji. Jeżeli chcemy zwyciężyć, musimy mieć ich więcej.
ru: Tanks are great at dealing with infantry - this one will be a valuble asset in this mission. Still, we need more if we are to succeed.

en: There is a tank fabrication facility nearby. Take it before the enemy uses those heavy units to stop our assault.
de: There is a tank fabrication facility nearby. Take it before the enemy uses those heavy units to stop our assault.
es: Hay una fabrica de tanques cerca. Tómala antes de que el enemigo use esas unidades pesadas para detener nuestro asalto.
fr: There is a tank fabrication facility nearby. Take it before the enemy uses those heavy units to stop our assault.
ja: There is a tank fabrication facility nearby. Take it before the enemy uses those heavy units to stop our assault.
pl: Niedaleko znajduje się fabryka zdolna produkować nowe jednostki pancerne. Zajmijmy ją zanim wróg użyje jej do zatrzymania naszej ofensywy.
ru: There is a tank fabrication facility nearby. Take it before the enemy uses those heavy units to stop our assault.

en: With both towers near their HQ we knocked out their comms completely.
de: With both towers near their HQ we knocked out their comms completely.
es: Con ambas torres cerca de su Cuartel General cancelaremos sus comunicaciones por completo.
fr: With both towers near their HQ we knocked out their comms completely.
ja: With both towers near their HQ we knocked out their comms completely.
pl: Przejęliśmy obydwie wieże komunikacyjne bazy wroga. To powinno kompletnie ją odciąć.
ru: With both towers near their HQ we knocked out their comms completely.

en: What the... ? Command, come in. Anyone?
de: What the... ? Command, come in. Anyone?
es: ¿Qué...? Comando, adelante. ¿Alguien?
fr: What the... ? Command, come in. Anyone?
ja: What the... ? Command, come in. Anyone?
pl: Co jest... ? Centrala, zgłoście się. Ktokolwiek mnie słyszy?
ru: What the... ? Command, come in. Anyone?

en: Good luck with that.
de: Good luck with that.
es: Buena suerte.
fr: Good luck with that.
ja: Good luck with that.
pl: Powodzenia w dzwonieniu do domu.
ru: Good luck with that.

en: Capturing these forward barracks would allow us to bring soldiers to the front line more easily.
de: Capturing these forward barracks would allow us to bring soldiers to the front line more easily.
es: La captura de estos cuarteles nos permitiría llevar llevar a los soldados a la línea del frente más fácilmente.
fr: Capturing these forward barracks would allow us to bring soldiers to the front line more easily.
ja: Capturing these forward barracks would allow us to bring soldiers to the front line more easily.
pl: Przejęcie wysuniętych baraków piechoty pozwoli nam sprawniej wzmacniać linię frontu nowymi jednostkami.
ru: Capturing these forward barracks would allow us to bring soldiers to the front line more easily.

en: Rebels are getting close!
de: Rebels are getting close!
es: ¡Los rebeldes se están acercando!
fr: Rebels are getting close!
ja: Rebels are getting close!
pl: Rebelianci się zbliżają!
ru: Rebels are getting close!

en: This is perimeter base! We are under attack! Repeat, we are under attack!
de: This is perimeter base! We are under attack! Repeat, we are under attack!
es: ¡Este perímetro pertenece a la base! ¡Estamos bajo ataque! ¡Repito, estamos bajo ataque!
fr: This is perimeter base! We are under attack! Repeat, we are under attack!
ja: This is perimeter base! We are under attack! Repeat, we are under attack!
pl: Tu baza graniczna! Jesteśmy atakowani! Powtarzam, baza została zaatakowana!
ru: This is perimeter base! We are under attack! Repeat, we are under attack!

en: This is not good, they managed to restore communications. We have to prepare for reinforcements.
de: This is not good, they managed to restore communications. We have to prepare for reinforcements.
es: Esto no es bueno, han logrado restaurar las comunicaciones. Tenemos que prepararnos para la llegada de refuerzos.
fr: This is not good, they managed to restore communications. We have to prepare for reinforcements.
ja: This is not good, they managed to restore communications. We have to prepare for reinforcements.
pl: Niedobrze, zdołali nawiązać połączenie z centralą. Przygotujmy się na nieuniknione posiłki.
ru: This is not good, they managed to restore communications. We have to prepare for reinforcements.

en: Great work on securing a foothold Commander, but our work here is not yet done.
de: Great work on securing a foothold Commander, but our work here is not yet done.
es: Gran trabajo al asegurar esta zona Comandante, pero nuestro trabajo aquí aún no ha terminado.
fr: Great work on securing a foothold Commander, but our work here is not yet done.
ja: Great work on securing a foothold Commander, but our work here is not yet done.
pl: Dobra robota z zabezpieczeniem przyczółku, Dowódco. Nasza praca nie jest jednak jeszcze skończona.
ru: Great work on securing a foothold Commander, but our work here is not yet done.

en: If we are to secure our presence in this region, we have to take over the military base.
de: If we are to secure our presence in this region, we have to take over the military base.
es: Si queremos asegurar nuestra presencia en esta región, tenemos que tomar el control de la base militar.
fr: If we are to secure our presence in this region, we have to take over the military base.
ja: If we are to secure our presence in this region, we have to take over the military base.
pl: Jeżeli mamy umocnić się w tym regionie, musimy przejąć pobliską bazę wojskową.
ru: If we are to secure our presence in this region, we have to take over the military base.

en: Armoured units are available. Expect the enemy base to deploy tanks of their own!
de: Armoured units are available. Expect the enemy base to deploy tanks of their own!
es: Las unidades blindadas están disponibles. ¡Cuenta con que la base enemiga despliegue sus propios tanques!
fr: Armoured units are available. Expect the enemy base to deploy tanks of their own!
ja: Armoured units are available. Expect the enemy base to deploy tanks of their own!
pl: Mamy do naszej dyspozycji jednostki pancerne. Spodziewamy się, że wróg odpowie swoimi czołgami!
ru: Armoured units are available. Expect the enemy base to deploy tanks of their own!

en: We've managed to cut off their landline communications, Commander. We should be able to overwhelm them before they can even call for help.
de: We've managed to cut off their landline communications, Commander. We should be able to overwhelm them before they can even call for help.
es: Hemos logrado cortar sus comunicaciones terrestres, Comandante. Deberíamos poder aplastarlos antes de que puedan siquiera pedir ayuda.
fr: We've managed to cut off their landline communications, Commander. We should be able to overwhelm them before they can even call for help.
ja: We've managed to cut off their landline communications, Commander. We should be able to overwhelm them before they can even call for help.
pl: Udało nam się odciąć linię komunikacyjną bazy. Powinniśmy być w stanie pokonać obronę zanim zdołają wezwać pomoc.
ru: We've managed to cut off their landline communications, Commander. We should be able to overwhelm them before they can even call for help.

en: Still, we should not waste any time. They can still use comm towers.
de: Still, we should not waste any time. They can still use comm towers.
es: Aún así, no deberíamos perder el tiempo. Todavía pueden usar las torres de comunicaciones.
fr: Still, we should not waste any time. They can still use comm towers.
ja: Still, we should not waste any time. They can still use comm towers.
pl: Mimo to nie możemy tracić czasu. Obrońcy wciąż mogą skorzystać z wież komunikacyjnych.
ru: Still, we should not waste any time. They can still use comm towers.

en: Rapid response unit reporting in!
de: Rapid response unit reporting in!
es: ¡Unidad de respuesta rápida informando!
fr: Rapid response unit reporting in!
ja: Rapid response unit reporting in!
pl: Jednostka szybkiego reagowania melduje się!
ru: Rapid response unit reporting in!

en: There is more equipment here, than we expected. They probably regret loosing this outpost already.
de: There is more equipment here, than we expected. They probably regret loosing this outpost already.
es: Aquí hay más equipamiento de lo que esperábamos. Probablemente se arrepientan de perder este puesto avanzado.
fr: There is more equipment here, than we expected. They probably regret loosing this outpost already.
ja: There is more equipment here, than we expected. They probably regret loosing this outpost already.
pl: Mają tu więcej sprzętu, niż myśleliśmy. Pewnie już żałują, że go utracili.
ru: There is more equipment here, than we expected. They probably regret loosing this outpost already.

en: Attack helicopter reporting for duty.
de: Attack helicopter reporting for duty.
es: Helicóptero de ataque informando.
fr: Attack helicopter reporting for duty.
ja: Attack helicopter reporting for duty.
pl: Helikopter szturmowy melduje się.
ru: Attack helicopter reporting for duty.

en: This is an airforce outpost meant to support the main base. Defences seem to be minimal, they did not expect an attack from this direction.
de: This is an airforce outpost meant to support the main base. Defences seem to be minimal, they did not expect an attack from this direction.
es: Este es un puesto avanzado de la fuerza aérea destinado a dar soporte a la base principal. Las defensas parecen ser mínimas, no esperaban un ataque desde esta dirección.
fr: This is an airforce outpost meant to support the main base. Defences seem to be minimal, they did not expect an attack from this direction.
ja: This is an airforce outpost meant to support the main base. Defences seem to be minimal, they did not expect an attack from this direction.
pl: To lotnisko, które wspomaga główną bazę. Obrona wydaje się minimalna, nie spodziewali się ataku z tej strony.
ru: This is an airforce outpost meant to support the main base. Defences seem to be minimal, they did not expect an attack from this direction.

en: We should claim this building for additional air support.
de: We should claim this building for additional air support.
es: Deberíamos reclamar este edificio para apoyo aéreo adicional.
fr: We should claim this building for additional air support.
ja: We should claim this building for additional air support.
pl: Powinniśmy je zając, aby zyskać dodatkowe wsparcie z powietrza.
ru: We should claim this building for additional air support.

en: You will not get away with this, traitors!
de: You will not get away with this, traitors!
es: ¡No os saldréis con la vuestra, traidores!
fr: You will not get away with this, traitors!
ja: You will not get away with this, traitors!
pl: Nie myślcie, że ujdzie wam to na sucho, zdrajcy!
ru: You will not get away with this, traitors!

en: It is you, who betrayed our great President! Arrest him!
de: It is you, who betrayed our great President! Arrest him!
es: ¡Eres tú quien traicionó a nuestro gran presidente! ¡Arréstenlo!
fr: It is you, who betrayed our great President! Arrest him!
ja: It is you, who betrayed our great President! Arrest him!
pl: To wy zdradziliście naszego prezydenta! Aresztować go!
ru: It is you, who betrayed our great President! Arrest him!

en: With the right flank secured, we were able to bring in some reinforcements.
de: With the right flank secured, we were able to bring in some reinforcements.
es: Con el flanco derecho asegurado, pudimos traer algunos refuerzos.
fr: With the right flank secured, we were able to bring in some reinforcements.
ja: With the right flank secured, we were able to bring in some reinforcements.
pl: Zabezpieczyliśmy prawą flankę, dzięki czemu udało nam się wprowadzić na pole bitwy dodatkowe siły.
ru: With the right flank secured, we were able to bring in some reinforcements.

en: Government forces throughout the peninsula are busy fighting local militia.
de: Government forces throughout the peninsula are busy fighting local militia.
es: Las fuerzas gubernamentales en toda la península están ocupadas luchando contra la milicia local.
fr: Government forces throughout the peninsula are busy fighting local militia.
ja: Government forces throughout the peninsula are busy fighting local militia.
pl: Wojska rządowa na półwyspie są zajęte walką z lokalną milicją.
ru: Government forces throughout the peninsula are busy fighting local militia.

en: With a cooridnated push, we can take controll of this land before they can re-organize.
de: With a cooridnated push, we can take controll of this land before they can re-organize.
es: Con un impulso coordinado, podemos tomar el control de esta tierra antes de que puedan reorganizarse.
fr: With a cooridnated push, we can take controll of this land before they can re-organize.
ja: With a cooridnated push, we can take controll of this land before they can re-organize.
pl: Wystarczy jeden zorganizowany atak, aby przejąć kontrolę nad tymi ziemiami zanim zorientują się co się dzieje.
ru: With a cooridnated push, we can take controll of this land before they can re-organize.

en: This base safeguards a strategic route connecting the peninsula with the rest of the country. Taking controll of this facility will cut off all remaining army, forcing them to surrender.
de: This base safeguards a strategic route connecting the peninsula with the rest of the country. Taking controll of this facility will cut off all remaining army, forcing them to surrender.
es: Esta base protege una ruta estratégica que conecta la península con el resto del país. Tomar el control de esta instalación cortará todo el ejército restante, obligándolos a rendirse.
fr: This base safeguards a strategic route connecting the peninsula with the rest of the country. Taking controll of this facility will cut off all remaining army, forcing them to surrender.
ja: This base safeguards a strategic route connecting the peninsula with the rest of the country. Taking controll of this facility will cut off all remaining army, forcing them to surrender.
pl: Ta baza zabezpiecza ważną strategicznie trasę łączącą półwysep z resztą kraju. Jeżeli ją zajmiemy, to odetniemy reszcie armii drogę odwrotu, zmuszając ich do poddania się.
ru: This base safeguards a strategic route connecting the peninsula with the rest of the country. Taking controll of this facility will cut off all remaining army, forcing them to surrender.

en: Sir, this looks like an abandoned rebel encampment. It seems they had no way of moving all this equipment, so they just left it.
de: Sir, this looks like an abandoned rebel encampment. It seems they had no way of moving all this equipment, so they just left it.
es: Señor, esto parece un campamento rebelde abandonado. Parece que no tenían forma de mover todo este equipo, así que simplemente lo abandonaron.
fr: Sir, this looks like an abandoned rebel encampment. It seems they had no way of moving all this equipment, so they just left it.
ja: Sir, this looks like an abandoned rebel encampment. It seems they had no way of moving all this equipment, so they just left it.
pl: Meldujemy odnalezienie bazy rebeliantów. Wygląda na opuszczoną. Chyba nie byli w stanie zabrać całego sprzętu, więc część zostawili.
ru: Sir, this looks like an abandoned rebel encampment. It seems they had no way of moving all this equipment, so they just left it.

en: There are two comm towers on the left flank.
de: There are two comm towers on the left flank.
es: Hay dos torres de comunicaciones en el flanco izquierdo.
fr: There are two comm towers on the left flank.
ja: There are two comm towers on the left flank.
pl: Na lewej flance znajdują się dwie wieże telekomunikacyjne.
ru: There are two comm towers on the left flank.

en: There may be some AA emplacements in the area, but if we capture those towers, we will be able to guide in more air support safely.
de: There may be some AA emplacements in the area, but if we capture those towers, we will be able to guide in more air support safely.
es: Puede haber algunos emplazamientos de AA en el área, pero si capturamos esas torres, podremos guiar más apoyo aéreo de forma segura.
fr: There may be some AA emplacements in the area, but if we capture those towers, we will be able to guide in more air support safely.
ja: There may be some AA emplacements in the area, but if we capture those towers, we will be able to guide in more air support safely.
pl: W pobliżu mogą znajdować się stanowiska przeciwlotnicze, jeżeli zajmiemy te wieże, to możemy sprowadzić bezpiecznie więcej sił powietrznych.
ru: There may be some AA emplacements in the area, but if we capture those towers, we will be able to guide in more air support safely.

en: Anti-tank team has arrived.
de: Anti-tank team has arrived.
es: El equipo antitanque ha llegado.
fr: Anti-tank team has arrived.
ja: Anti-tank team has arrived.
pl: Jednostka przeciwpancerna dotarła na pole bitwy.
ru: Anti-tank team has arrived.

en: Welcome, Sir. As you may already know, recent setbacks have put us in an unfavourable position. We have to start pushing back.
de: Welcome, Sir. As you may already know, recent setbacks have put us in an unfavourable position. We have to start pushing back.
es: Bienvenido Señor, Como ya sabrá, los recientes reveses nos han puesto en una posición desfavorable. Tenemos que comenzar a retroceder.
fr: Welcome, Sir. As you may already know, recent setbacks have put us in an unfavourable position. We have to start pushing back.
ja: Welcome, Sir. As you may already know, recent setbacks have put us in an unfavourable position. We have to start pushing back.
pl: Witam. Jak już być może wiesz, ostatnie porażki postawiły nas w trudnej sytuacji. Musimy rozpocząc kontrofensywę.
ru: Welcome, Sir. As you may already know, recent setbacks have put us in an unfavourable position. We have to start pushing back.

en: Our intel suggests, that this city is where it all started. Rebel activity appears to have lessened since the initial attack - they probably moved on.
de: Our intel suggests, that this city is where it all started. Rebel activity appears to have lessened since the initial attack - they probably moved on.
es: Nuestra inteligencia sugiere que esta ciudad es donde todo comenzó. La actividad rebelde parece haber disminuido desde el ataque inicial - probablemente continuaron.
fr: Our intel suggests, that this city is where it all started. Rebel activity appears to have lessened since the initial attack - they probably moved on.
ja: Our intel suggests, that this city is where it all started. Rebel activity appears to have lessened since the initial attack - they probably moved on.
pl: Nasz wywiad sugeruje, że rebelia rozpoczęła się właśnie w tym mieście. Aktywność milicji wydaje się teraz mniejsza - zapewne przesunęli siły w inne miejsce.
ru: Our intel suggests, that this city is where it all started. Rebel activity appears to have lessened since the initial attack - they probably moved on.

en: Still, we should not underestimate the garrison stationed here. Liberating this city will be an important step in our campaign.
de: Still, we should not underestimate the garrison stationed here. Liberating this city will be an important step in our campaign.
es: Aún así, no debemos subestimar la guarnición estacionada aquí. La liberación de esta ciudad será un paso importante en nuestra campaña.
fr: Still, we should not underestimate the garrison stationed here. Liberating this city will be an important step in our campaign.
ja: Still, we should not underestimate the garrison stationed here. Liberating this city will be an important step in our campaign.
pl: Mimo to nie powinniśmy traktować tego ataku jako łatwego. Wyzwolenie miasta będzie ważnym krokiem w naszej kampanii.
ru: Still, we should not underestimate the garrison stationed here. Liberating this city will be an important step in our campaign.

en: Sir, the base of operations is up and running.
de: Sir, the base of operations is up and running.
es: Señor, la base de operaciones está funcionando.
fr: Sir, the base of operations is up and running.
ja: Sir, the base of operations is up and running.
pl: Nasza baza jest ukończona i gotowa.
ru: Sir, the base of operations is up and running.

en: Good.
de: Good.
es: Bien.
fr: Good.
ja: Good.
pl: Dobrze.
ru: Good.

en: Air support reporting in.
de: Air support reporting in.
es: Soporte aéreo reportando.
fr: Air support reporting in.
ja: Air support reporting in.
pl: Wsparcie powietrzne melduje się.
ru: Air support reporting in.

en: We've got decent amount of ground units, though our air capabilities are limited for this engagement. Use these assets well.
de: We've got decent amount of ground units, though our air capabilities are limited for this engagement. Use these assets well.
es: Tenemos una cantidad decente de unidades terrestres, aunque nuestras capacidades aéreas son limitadas para este combate. Usa bien estos activos.
fr: We've got decent amount of ground units, though our air capabilities are limited for this engagement. Use these assets well.
ja: We've got decent amount of ground units, though our air capabilities are limited for this engagement. Use these assets well.
pl: Mamy sporą ilość sił naziemnych, ale nasze możliwości w powietrzu są ograniczone. Musimy użyć ich najlepiej jak się da.
ru: We've got decent amount of ground units, though our air capabilities are limited for this engagement. Use these assets well.

en: Patrol squad reporting back.
de: Patrol squad reporting back.
es: Escuadrón de patrulla informando.
fr: Patrol squad reporting back.
ja: Patrol squad reporting back.
pl: Oddział patrolowy zgłasza zakończenie misji.
ru: Patrol squad reporting back.

en: No rest for you, we are under attack!
de: No rest for you, we are under attack!
es: No hay descanso, ¡estamos bajo ataque!
fr: No rest for you, we are under attack!
ja: No rest for you, we are under attack!
pl: Jeszcze nie, jesteśmy atakowani!
ru: No rest for you, we are under attack!

en: We are loosing ground! Warn the Commander!
de: We are loosing ground! Warn the Commander!
es: ¡Estamos perdiendo terreno! Advierte al Comandante
fr: We are loosing ground! Warn the Commander!
ja: We are loosing ground! Warn the Commander!
pl: Przegrywamy tą bitwę! Powiadomcie dowódcę!
ru: We are loosing ground! Warn the Commander!

en: Yes Sir!
de: Yes Sir!
es: ¡Sí Señor!
fr: Yes Sir!
ja: Yes Sir!
pl: Tak jest!
ru: Yes Sir!

en: He got away. Doesn't matter, let's focus on the mission at hand.
de: He got away. Doesn't matter, let's focus on the mission at hand.
es: Se escapó. No importa, centrémonos en la misión que tenemos entre manos.
fr: He got away. Doesn't matter, let's focus on the mission at hand.
ja: He got away. Doesn't matter, let's focus on the mission at hand.
pl: Zdołał uciec. To bez znaczenia, skupmy się na obecnym zadaniu.
ru: He got away. Doesn't matter, let's focus on the mission at hand.

en: You might think you are winning, but this is only a minor setback. We will be back, and in greater numbers!
de: You might think you are winning, but this is only a minor setback. We will be back, and in greater numbers!
es: Podrías pensar que estás ganando, pero esto es solo un pequeño revés. ¡Volveremos, y en mayor cantidad!
fr: You might think you are winning, but this is only a minor setback. We will be back, and in greater numbers!
ja: You might think you are winning, but this is only a minor setback. We will be back, and in greater numbers!
pl: Może się wam wydawać, że wygraliście, ale to tylko niewielka porażka dla nas. Powrócimy tu z większymi siłami!
ru: You might think you are winning, but this is only a minor setback. We will be back, and in greater numbers!

en: We will see about that.
de: We will see about that.
es: Ya lo veremos.
fr: We will see about that.
ja: We will see about that.
pl: To się jeszcze okaże.
ru: We will see about that.

en: Alarm! Unidentified troops spotted near the base perimeter!
de: Alarm! Unidentified troops spotted near the base perimeter!
es: ¡Alarma! ¡Tropas no identificadas detectadas cerca del perímetro de la base!
fr: Alarm! Unidentified troops spotted near the base perimeter!
ja: Alarm! Unidentified troops spotted near the base perimeter!
pl: Alarm! Niezidentyfikowany oddział piechoty zauważony w pobliżu bazy!
ru: Alarm! Unidentified troops spotted near the base perimeter!

en: They spotted us! Commence the attack!
de: They spotted us! Commence the attack!
es: ¡Nos vieron! ¡Comenzar el ataque!
fr: They spotted us! Commence the attack!
ja: They spotted us! Commence the attack!
pl: Odkryli nas! Rozpocząć szturm!
ru: They spotted us! Commence the attack!

en: Sir! We had reports of enemy movements in the area, but we did not expect them to organize so fast.
de: Sir! We had reports of enemy movements in the area, but we did not expect them to organize so fast.
es: ¡Señor! Tuvimos informes de movimientos enemigos en el área, pero no esperábamos que se organizaran tan rápido.
fr: Sir! We had reports of enemy movements in the area, but we did not expect them to organize so fast.
ja: Sir! We had reports of enemy movements in the area, but we did not expect them to organize so fast.
pl: Panie Generale! Otrzymaliśmy raporty o ruchach wojsk wroga w tym rejonie, ale nie spodziewaliśmy się zorganizowanego ataku tak szybko.
ru: Sir! We had reports of enemy movements in the area, but we did not expect them to organize so fast.

en: And they are taking the auxilary barracks! Tank factory is probably being attacked as well. We have to protect our flanks.
de: And they are taking the auxilary barracks! Tank factory is probably being attacked as well. We have to protect our flanks.
es: ¡Están tomando los barracones auxiliares! La fábrica de tanques probablemente sea atacada también. Tenemos que proteger nuestros flancos.
fr: And they are taking the auxilary barracks! Tank factory is probably being attacked as well. We have to protect our flanks.
ja: And they are taking the auxilary barracks! Tank factory is probably being attacked as well. We have to protect our flanks.
pl: Zamierzają przejąć baraki wsparcia! Fabryka czołgów zapewne też zostanie zaatakowana. Musimy zabezpieczyć flanki.
ru: And they are taking the auxilary barracks! Tank factory is probably being attacked as well. We have to protect our flanks.

en: Left flank secure.
de: Left flank secure.
es: Flanco izquierdo seguro
fr: Left flank secure.
ja: Left flank secure.
pl: Lewa flanka zabezpieczona.
ru: Left flank secure.

en: Right flank secure.
de: Right flank secure.
es: Flanco derecho seguro.
fr: Right flank secure.
ja: Right flank secure.
pl: Prawa flanka zabezpieczona.
ru: Right flank secure.

en: We've managed to take over enemy communication line and intercept some chatter about plans on attacking an airport.
de: We've managed to take over enemy communication line and intercept some chatter about plans on attacking an airport.
es: Hemos logrado capturar la línea de comunicación enemiga e interceptar alguna charla sobre planes para atacar un aeropuerto.
fr: We've managed to take over enemy communication line and intercept some chatter about plans on attacking an airport.
ja: We've managed to take over enemy communication line and intercept some chatter about plans on attacking an airport.
pl: Udało nam się przejąć linię komunikacyjną. Przechwyciliśmy transmisję wskazującą na atak na jakieś lotnisko.
ru: We've managed to take over enemy communication line and intercept some chatter about plans on attacking an airport.

en: This cannot be good...
de: This cannot be good...
es: Esto no puede ser bueno...
fr: This cannot be good...
ja: This cannot be good...
pl: To nie brzmi dobrze...
ru: This cannot be good...

en: We've got you now!
de: We've got you now!
es: ¡Te tenemos!
fr: We've got you now!
ja: We've got you now!
pl: Mamy was!
ru: We've got you now!

en: Target spotted.
de: Target spotted.
es: Objetivo marcado.
fr: Target spotted.
ja: Target spotted.
pl: Cel w zasięgu.
ru: Target spotted.

en: Let's clear those tanks.
de: Let's clear those tanks.
es: Vamos a limpiar esos tanques.
fr: Let's clear those tanks.
ja: Let's clear those tanks.
pl: Zniszczmy trochę czołgów.
ru: Let's clear those tanks.

en: Commander, while searching the airport we have found some documents left by the enemy officers.
de: Commander, while searching the airport we have found some documents left by the enemy officers.
es: Comandante, mientras buscábamos en el aeropuerto, hemos encontrado algunos documentos dejados por los oficiales enemigos.
fr: Commander, while searching the airport we have found some documents left by the enemy officers.
ja: Commander, while searching the airport we have found some documents left by the enemy officers.
pl: Dowódco, w trakcie przeszukiwania lotniska natrafiliśmy na dokumenty pozostawione przez wycofujących się oficerów wroga.
ru: Commander, while searching the airport we have found some documents left by the enemy officers.

en: It is some kind of flight schedule, probably for military supplies. We will make good use of this.
de: It is some kind of flight schedule, probably for military supplies. We will make good use of this.
es: Es algún tipo de horario de vuelo, probablemente para suministros militares. Haremos buen uso de esto.
fr: It is some kind of flight schedule, probably for military supplies. We will make good use of this.
ja: It is some kind of flight schedule, probably for military supplies. We will make good use of this.
pl: Wyglądają na plan przelotów, zapewne transporty wojskowe. Zrobimy z tego odpowiedni użytek.
ru: It is some kind of flight schedule, probably for military supplies. We will make good use of this.

en: Objective achieved.
de: Objective achieved.
es: Objetivo alcanzado.
fr: Objective achieved.
ja: Objective achieved.
pl: Rozkaz wykonany.
ru: Objective achieved.

en: Now let's clear this area of enemy units, we can't risk loosing this terminal.
de: Now let's clear this area of enemy units, we can't risk loosing this terminal.
es: Ahora limpiemos esta área de unidades enemigas, no podemos arriesgarnos a perder esta terminal.
fr: Now let's clear this area of enemy units, we can't risk loosing this terminal.
ja: Now let's clear this area of enemy units, we can't risk loosing this terminal.
pl: Teraz czas oczyścić to miasto z sił wroga - nie możemy ryzykować kontrataku i utraty terminala.
ru: Now let's clear this area of enemy units, we can't risk loosing this terminal.

en: Reiconessanse reports multiple tank factories in the area. Those helicopters will come really handy.
de: Reiconessanse reports multiple tank factories in the area. Those helicopters will come really handy.
es: Reconocimiento reporta múltiples fábricas de tanques en el área. Esos helicópteros serán realmente útiles.
fr: Reiconessanse reports multiple tank factories in the area. Those helicopters will come really handy.
ja: Reiconessanse reports multiple tank factories in the area. Those helicopters will come really handy.
pl: Rekonesans wykazał wiele fabryk czołgów w okolicy. Helikoptery bardzo się przydadzą.
ru: Reiconessanse reports multiple tank factories in the area. Those helicopters will come really handy.

en: Forward camp is ready, Commander.
de: Forward camp is ready, Commander.
es: El campamento delantero está listo, Comandante.
fr: Forward camp is ready, Commander.
ja: Forward camp is ready, Commander.
pl: Baza wypadowa ukończona, Dowódco.
ru: Forward camp is ready, Commander.

en: Commander, let's get going.
de: Commander, let's get going.
es: Comandante, vámonos.
fr: Commander, let's get going.
ja: Commander, let's get going.
pl: Czas ruszać.
ru: Commander, let's get going.

en: This is the local airport. It is not of high strategic importance, but loosing it will strike fear into enemies hearts.
de: This is the local airport. It is not of high strategic importance, but loosing it will strike fear into enemies hearts.
es: Este es el aeropuerto local. No es de una gran importancia estratégica, pero perderlo causará temor en los corazones de los enemigos.
fr: This is the local airport. It is not of high strategic importance, but loosing it will strike fear into enemies hearts.
ja: This is the local airport. It is not of high strategic importance, but loosing it will strike fear into enemies hearts.
pl: To jest lokalne lotnisko. Nie jest ono ważne strategicznie, ale jego utrata na pewno obniży morale naszego wroga.
ru: This is the local airport. It is not of high strategic importance, but loosing it will strike fear into enemies hearts.

en: Closing in on the designated area. AA guns ready for deployment.
de: Closing in on the designated area. AA guns ready for deployment.
es: Acercándose al área designada. Armas AA listas para su despliegue.
fr: Closing in on the designated area. AA guns ready for deployment.
ja: Closing in on the designated area. AA guns ready for deployment.
pl: Zbliżamy się do wyznaczonego obszaru. Działa prezciwlotnicze gotowe do rozstawienia.
ru: Closing in on the designated area. AA guns ready for deployment.

en: If the information we aquired is correct, there should be a military plane flying over this area soon.
de: If the information we aquired is correct, there should be a military plane flying over this area soon.
es: Si la información que adquirimos es correcta, debería de haber un avión militar volando sobre esta área pronto.
fr: If the information we aquired is correct, there should be a military plane flying over this area soon.
ja: If the information we aquired is correct, there should be a military plane flying over this area soon.
pl: Jeżeli nasze informacje były prawdziwe, to niedługo powinien przelatywać w tej okolicy wojskowy transport.
ru: If the information we aquired is correct, there should be a military plane flying over this area soon.

en: We have identified best position to set up our AA emplacement, but it is currently occupied by the enemy.
de: We have identified best position to set up our AA emplacement, but it is currently occupied by the enemy.
es: Hemos identificado la mejor posición para establecer nuestro emplazamiento AA, pero actualmente está ocupado por el enemigo.
fr: We have identified best position to set up our AA emplacement, but it is currently occupied by the enemy.
ja: We have identified best position to set up our AA emplacement, but it is currently occupied by the enemy.
pl: Zidentyfikowaliśmy najlepszą pozycję dla rozstawienia dział AA, lecz jest ona zajęta przez wroga.
